title: PERSON OF INTEREST REACTION - 2x4 - "Triggerman" | SEARCHING FOR BOBBY FINCHER
author: Mega Reacts
comment: I really love how they highlight the similarities between reese and riley. They kill/hurt people, fell in love and desperately tried to protect them. I think Riley's story is still the happiest ending reese could hope for himself.

"Searching for Bobby Fincher." Heheh. I see what you did, sir...

I kinda like to not like this episode (if that makes sense?). Massey is a menacing SOB, and I just so hated how he has that part of NY under his thumb like that.

Glad to have you back uploading new vids.  Hope you're feeling all better now.

I just binged through the whole show and I wondered if two characters ever had the same name in this show.  Hearing this dude being called Riley answered that.
Just realized Riley looks like a young Robert Patrick.
description: Support me on Patreon for uncut reactions and the ability to vote in polls to decide what I react to next. https://www.patreon.com/megareacts
